mapper.insert: insert into payment_record (user_id, user_type, project_id, submission_id, payment_type, amount, status, payment_method, transaction_id, remark, created_at, updated_at) values (#{userId}, #{userType}, #{projectId}, #{submissionId}, #{paymentType}, #{amount}, #{status}, #{paymentMethod}, #{transactionId}, #{remark}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: select * from payment_record where project_id = #{projectId} and payment_type = #{paymentType} order by created_at desc limit 1
